text: 'iny tawakalt ealaa allah rabiy warabikum malik kula shay' walmtsrf fyh, fala ysybny shay' 'iilaa bamrh, wahu alqadir ealaa kl shy', falays min shay' ydibb ealaa hadhih al'ard 'iilaa wallah malkh, wahu fi sultanuh wtsrfh. 'iina rabiy ealaa sirat mstqym, 'aya eadl fi qdayh wshreh wamrh. yjazy almhsn b'ihsanh walmsy' b'isa'th
